item.title: Lambda Step by Step
item.description: During last weeks, I’ve worked a lot with AWS Lambda. The main challenge I had was to look for a method to locally test those functions. Of course, it is possible to do some partial code execution as part of unit/integration test setup, but that wonâ€™t be close enough to production setup. I’d like to build a sort of how-to guide in order to have a reference in the future. To do so, I have to:
